8615.name: Summoning Crystal
8615.description: A crystal imbued with mystical power. Used for teleportation magic.

8616.name: Spellbook: Summon Friend
8616.description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Friend. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners. Required level: 56

8617.name: Spellbook: Word of Invitation
8617.description: Spellbook needed to learn Word of Invitation. Used by Sorcerers, Spellsingers and Spellhowlers.

8618.name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Modern Language Version)
8618.description: Restores forgotten abilities. The book was re-published after being translated into the modern language. (Can only be used by characters level 52 or higher.)

8619.name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Language Version)
8619.description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book was published by ancient scholars for research purposes. It contains more information than the modern language version. (Can only be used by characters level 61 or higher.)

8620.name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Manuscript)
8620.description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book is a hand-written copy of the original. It is almost the same as the original version. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)

8621.name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Version)
8621.description: Awakens a forgotten ability. Those who lack the requisite knowledge cannot understand its contents. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)

8622.name: Elixir of Life (No Grade)
8622.description: Regenerates HP. Can only be used by characters below level 19 upon themselves. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of Life (No Grade)

8623.name: Elixir of Life (D-Grade)
8623.description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of Life (No Grade)

8624.name: Elixir of Life (C-Grade)
8624.description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of Life (No Grade)

8625.name: Elixir of Life (B-Grade)
8625.description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 52 and 60. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of Life (No Grade)

8626.name: Elixir of Life (A-Grade)
8626.description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 61 and 75. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of Life (No Grade)

8627.name: Elixir of Life (S-Grade)
8627.description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is 76 or higher. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of Life (No Grade)

8628.name: Elixir of Mental Strength (No Grade)
8628.description: Regenerates MP. Can only be used by characters below level 19 upon themselves. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of Mental Strength (No Grade)

8629.name: Elixir of Mental Strength (D-Grade)
8629.description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 20 and below level 39 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes. Elixir of Mental Strength (No Grade)

8630.name: Elixir of Mental Strength (C-Grade)
8630.description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 40 and below level 51 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes. Elixir of Mental Strength (No Grade)

8631.name: Elixir of Mental Strength (B-Grade)
8631.description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 52 and below level 60 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes. Elixir of Mental Strength (No Grade)

8632.name: Elixir of Mental Strength (A-Grade)

8633.name: Elixir of Mental Strength (S-Grade)
8633.description: Regenerates MP. Can be used by characters above level 76 upon themselves. Re-use delay 5 minutes. Elixir of Mental Strength (No Grade)

8634.name: Elixir of CP (No Grade)
8634.description: Regenerates CP. Can only be used by characters below level 19 upon themselves. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of CP (No Grade)

8635.name: Elixir of CP (D-Grade)
8635.description: Regenerates CP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of CP (No Grade)

8636.name: Elixir of CP (C-Grade)
8636.description: Regenerates CP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of CP (No Grade)

8637.name: Elixir of CP (B-Grade)

8638.name: Elixir of CP (A-Grade)

8639.name: Elixir of CP (S-Grade)
8639.description: Regenerates CP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is 76 or higher. Re-use delay is 5 minutes. Elixir of CP (No Grade)

8658.name: Mysterious Solvent
8658.description: Dilutes any substance it is mixed with. Used when creating an elixir.

8659.name: Coffer of Shadows
8659.description: A mystical object that has a tiny bit of unstable dark energy trapped inside. Double-click to transform into a random special item. Coffer of Shadows

8660.name: Demon Horns
8660.description: A hair accessory for the 2006 Halloween Event.

8661.name: Mask of Spirits
8661.description: A hair accessory for the 2006 Halloween Event.

8662.name: Fairy Antennae (Event)
8662.description: Cute antennae hair accessory with stars. This is an event item which cannot be exchanged or dropped.

8663.name: Mystery Potion (Event)
8663.description: Altered Realities Event Item. The label reads "Effects of this oil may be unpredictable. Results are temporary at best." Mystery Potion

8664.description: Altered Realities Event Item. The label reads "Effects of this oil may be unpredictable. BEWARE! Changes caused will be permanent. Drink at your own risk!" Facelifting Potion

8678.name: Sirra's Blade
8678.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Haste, Health, or Critical Poison.

8679.name: Sword of Ipos
8679.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Focus, Haste, or Health.

8680.name: Barakiel's Axe
8680.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Health, Haste, or Focus.

8681.name: Behemoth's Tuning Fork
8681.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Focus, Health, or Anger.

8682.name: Naga Storm
8682.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Focus, Critical Damage, or Back Blow.

8683.name: Tiphon's Spear
8683.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Critical Stun, Towering Blow or Wide Blow. Polearm Multi-attack

8684.name: Shyeed's Bow
8684.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Cheap Shot, Focus, or Quick Recovery.

8685.name: Sobekk's Hurricane
8685.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Rsk. Haste, Haste, or Critical Drain.

8686.name: Themis' Tongue
8686.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Mana Up, Mental Shield, or Magic Focus.

8687.name: Cabrio's Hand
8687.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Conversion, Mana Up, or Magic Silence.

8688.name: Daimon Crystal
8688.description: Bestows one of the following functions: Mana Up, Acumen, or Mental Shield.

8689.name: Blood Sword Akamanah
8689.description: This demonic twin blade was forged by Gran Kain, the god of chaos. It needs the fresh blood of a PK at least every 24 hours or it will disappear. Blood Sword Akamanah
